version_description: Bugfixing and preparation for launch
Bugfixing and preparation for launch
Bugfixing and preparation for launch

* Fixed an issue whereby End of Turn effects would get delayed until the opponent finished reading the tooltips.

* Fixed an issue whereby using the Order ability of Treant Mantis: Stalk would result in breaking the match. Treant Mantis: Stalk card

MERCHANTS OF OFIR: New expansion is now available!


They came from faraway lands — foreign and mysterious. They’ve brought marvelous wares with them — both magnificent and terrifying. On their journey, merchants of Ofir will cross paths with all

Season of the Wolf is upon us!

Whenever a unit appears on the battlefield, damage it by 2, then boost it by 4. If it is a Witcher, boost it by 4 instead.

Update 7.4 is here and brings Draft Mode - a new game mode, which replaces Arena and is now available in Early Access! Additionally, a new Journey has started featuring the almighty Alzur! We've also added numerous fixes to improve the game's performance!
